snippet: Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India passed his first major economic changes, as Parliament voted to allow more foreign investment in the insurance sector.
abstract: Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi passes his first major economic changes, as Parliament votes to allow more foreign investment in the insurance sector.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Narendra Modi of India passed his first major economic changes, as Parliament voted to allow more foreign investment in the insurance sector.

headline.main: India Approves Changes on Foreign Investment
